輹字的基本解释

輹
fù
车伏兔，即垫在车箱和车轴之间的木块。上面承载车箱，下面呈弧形，架在轴上。

輹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》方六切，入屋，非。］
捆绑车伏兔与车轴的绳索。《说文·車部》：“輹，車軸縛也。”段玉裁注：“謂以革若絲之類纏束於軸，以固軸也。縛者，束也。”《易·大畜》：“輿説輹。”陆德明释文：“輹，車下縛也。”章炳麟《訄书·分镇匡谬》：“若其檢式羣下，和齊縣内，微革更官制，則猶篆車之無輹，而丁時者或未意是也。”一说指车箱底板伏兔。古代车子上钩连车箱底板与车轴的部件。

輹字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輹； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?方六切，音福。【說文】車下縛也。【廣韻】車伏兔也。【集韻】車軸縛也。【釋名】車伏兔又曰輹，輹伏也，伏于軸上也。【易·大畜】輿脫輹。又【大壯】壯于大輿之輹。　又【集韻】芳六切，音蝮。義同。

考證：〔【釋名】輹，伏也。曰伏兔者，伏于軸上似之也。〕　謹照原文釋名下改車伏兔又曰輹，輹伏也，伏于軸上也。
輹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輹字的起名意思

暂无。

Mole
Basic explanation of words
Mole
fù
Car Futu, the wooden block between the car box and the axle. The upper part carries the carriage, and the lower part is arc-shaped and is mounted on the shaft.
Mole
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" square six cuts, enter the house, non. ]
Bundle the ropes of the car and the axles. "Shuowen·Car Department": "Chan, the axle is bound." Duan Yucai's note: "It is said that the leather is wrapped around the axle, and the axle is fixed. The one who binds is bound." "Yi·Da "Animal": "Yu Shuo Mo." Lu Deming explained: "Moe, the car under the bound also." Zhang Binglin, "The Book of the Book · Sub-town Kuang Mi": "If it is prosecuted, and in Heqi County, the micro-revolution will be more official. It's still like a seal car, but it might not be the case for a small time." One said that the bottom of the car box is flattened by a rabbit. An ancient car was hooked on the part of the bottom plate and axle of the car.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輹; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1246 No. 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Square six cut, sound blessing. [Said the text] Tie under the car. [Guang Yun] Car Futu also. [Jiyun] The axle is bound. [Release name] The Che Futu also called the 蹹, the 蹹鹹 also, lie on the shaft. 【Easy·Big Animal】Yu Shuo. Also 【Dazhuang】 is stronger than Da Yuzhi.　 [Ji Yun] Fang six cuts, sound worm. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Release Name] Che, Fu Ye. Those who say that the rabbit is lying on the shaft are like it. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the name of the car and the rabbit according to the original explanation.
